summary_md: Cyprus, in the year 2024, has a per capita GDP of 32,999 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 1.80% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 5.60% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 81.65 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 91.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is recorded at 96.69% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Cyprus's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 32,999 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 96.69% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Cyprus shows an unemployment rate of 5.60% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the general employment situation.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 91.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Cyprus demonstrates a significant level of digital connectivity.
sections.health_env_md: The health environment in Cyprus is reflected by an average life expectancy of 81.65 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN).
